Read Me.txt >

How to play?
You can explore the dungeon,and then,try to get more deeper!

Left Right Up Down---Move
Z---Pick Something up
Pressing X---Get Ready for Your Attack
W---Open your bag(If you open your bag,The game'll Pause)
D---Drop Something
C---FastAttack(Fast to use Attack Spells)
S---FastDig(Fast to use Dig)
Shift-Get into the next floor & Open Chest
F-Change Font

What is it?
S---Spell
P---Potion
E---Enemy
@---You
>---Down
<---Up
.---Floor
red.---Lava
